Translations.Text: Mu vy’ukuri Imana itegeka ibintu vy’ubutungane, hamwe nukugira impuhwe hamwe nuguha abagenzi, hamwe n’ugutuza abafise umwanda w’amabi n’ubuhemu, kandi ikaba kebura kugira ngo mushobore kumenya nugukurikira

Nimukwize indagano mutanga kw’izina ry’Imana mugihe muzitanze, kandi ntimuze mudohoke kurizo mugihe mwamaze kuzemeza, mugihe mwamaze kuyigira Imana kuba ariyo cabona canyu, mu vy’ukuri Imana niyo ifise ubumenyi bw’ivyo mugira vyose

Kandi ntimube nkawa mukenyezi yaca urunyuzi rwiwe ibice bice mugihe rwari rukomeye, hanyuma mugira indahiro zanyu kuba ariyo nzira zuguhendana hagati yanyu, kubera umurwi umwe w’abantu kuba ariwo ufise ubushobozi gusumba uwundi, mu vy’ukuri Imana iriko irabagerageza muri iyo nzira, kandi ntankeka izobibereka k’umusi w’imperuka kuvyo mwahora mutumvikanako
N’Imana iyo ibishaka mu vy’ukuri yari kubagira umurwi umwe wonyene gusa, mugabo ireka hakazimira uwo yishakiye, nukurongora uwo yishakiye, mu vy’ukuri muzobazwa kuvyo mwahora mugira

Kandi ntimugire indahiro zanyu kuba ariyo nzira yuguhendana hagati yany(u, hanyuma ukuguru ntikuze kunyerere munyuma yaho kwari guhagaze neza, n’uguhonja amabi yanyu kubera ukuzitira inzira y’Imana nukuronka ibihano bininiya cane)
Kandi ntimugurishe indagano z’Imana kukiguzi ataco kimaze, n’ibiri ku Mana nivyo vyiza kuri mwebwe nimwaba mutahura neza
Ivyo mufise vyose bizohera, n’ibiri ku Mana nivyo bizoramba, mu vy’ukuri twebwe tuzoha impembo zabigumije kuvyo bahora bagira
Abagira ineza mubagabo no mubagore nabo ari aba Isilamu, twebwe tuzobahindurira ubuzima bwiza nukubaha impembo zabo niniya cane kubera ineza bahora bagira
Niwaba ushaka gusoma iyi Qur’ani ntagatifu, ni wikingire ku Mana yawe ikurinde na Sheteni yavumwe n’Imana
Mu vy’ukuri Shetani ntabubasha ifise kuri barya bemeye Imana yabo y’ukuri n’abizera Umuremyi wabo
Ubushobozi bwayo nikuri barya bantu bayigira basoma mbike bayo no hejuru yabagereranya Imana n’ibindi bintu
Mugihe duhinduye ijambo ry’Imana kurindi jambo, n’Imana nayo ikaba ifise ubumenyi bw’ivyo imanura, baca bavuga bati:- wewe wiyadukije gusa, mugabo benshi muribo ntabumenyi bafise
Vuga uti:- Mutima mweranda niwo wamanuye kuva k’Umuremyi wawe w’ukuri, kugira ngo bemeze kuri bamwe bemeye Imana yabo y’ukuri yuko uburongozi hamwe n’inkuru nziza kuba Isilamu
Ntankeka turazi neza yuko bavuga bati:- hariho umuntu amwigisha ururimi rw’uwo batumberezako, n’imvugo y’abanyamahanga, n’iyi n’imvugo y’ururimi rw’icarabu rutomoye neza
Mu vy’ukuri bamwe batemera amajambo y’Imana y’ukuri, Imana ntizobarongora, mugabo bazoronka ibihano bibabaza cane
Abadukana ububeshi nibarya batemera amajambo y’Imana y’ukuri abo rero nibo babeshi

Uwuhakana Imana yiwe y’ukuri munyuma yubu Isilamu bwiwe, nuko dukuyemwo uwategetswe nawe umutima wiwe uturuye kw’idini rya Isilamu, mugabo uwugururiye igikiriza ciwe k’ubuhakanyi bw’Imana, abo nibo ishavu ry’Imana rizoba hejuru yabo, kandi bazoronka ibihano bininiya cane
Ivyo vyose nukubera yuko bakunze cane ubuzima bwo ng’aha kw’Isi gusumba ubuzima bwo mw’Ijuru, kandi nuko Imana itarongora abahakanyi b’Imana
Abo nibo bantu Imana yazivye imitima yabo n’amatwi yabo, hamwe n’amaso yabo, abo rero nibo bibagiwe bimwe vy’ukuri
Ntankeka yuko abo bantu aribo bantu bari muruhombo rwo k’umusi w’imperuka

Hanyuma mu vy’ukuri Umuremyi wawe kuri barya bimutse munyuma yukugira ingorane z’ibihano, hanyuma bakarwanira idini hamwe n’ukwihangana, ntankeka Umuremyi wawe inyuma y’ibi vyose niyo ifise ikigongwe cinshi n’impuhwe zihagije
